us.thetaco.survivalgames.utils

Class Values

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.thetaco.survivalgames.utils.Values

  • public abstract class Values
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all the config values
    Author:
    activates

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ALLOW_COMMANDS
      Used to determine if all commands are allowed in an arena game
      static boolean ALLOW_SPECTATORS
      Used to determine if spectators should be allowed or not
      static boolean BORDER_ENABLED
      Used to determine if the border system will be used in arenas
      static int BORDER_TICK_DELAY
      Used to determine how many arena ticks it will take to shrink the border by one block
      static boolean BROADCAST_MINUS_REP
      Used to determine if other player's an arena will be notified that a player disconnecting during mid game has negatively impacted their reputation
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> BYPASSING_COMMANDS
      The commands that are allowed even if ALLOW_COMMANDS is set to false
      static int DEFAULT_REPUTATION
      Used to determine the default reputation (only useful if reputation is enabled)
      static boolean LIGHTNING_ENABLED
      Used to determine if players are struck by lighting when they die
      static int MINIMUM_REP_ADD
      Used to determine the minimum amount of seconds a player must be in an arena before they will earn a reputation point.
      static int NO_RETURN_SECONDS
      Used if the USE_NO_RETURN option is enabled...
      static boolean REPUTATION_ENABLED
      Used to determine if the reputation system should be used or not
      static int SPECTATOR_LIMIT
      The desired spectator limit (only useful if ALLOW_SPECTATORS is true)
      static boolean USE_NO_RETURN
      Used to determine if the no point of "return option is enabled"

    • Field Detail

      • USE_NO_RETURN

        public static boolean USE_NO_RETURN
        Used to determine if the no point of "return option is enabled"

      • NO_RETURN_SECONDS

        public static int NO_RETURN_SECONDS
        Used if the USE_NO_RETURN option is enabled... It's the amount in seconds where after that point the game cannot be ended until only 1 player is left (or the time runs out)

      • ALLOW_SPECTATORS

        public static boolean ALLOW_SPECTATORS
        Used to determine if spectators should be allowed or not

      • SPECTATOR_LIMIT

        public static int SPECTATOR_LIMIT
        The desired spectator limit (only useful if ALLOW_SPECTATORS is true)

      • ALLOW_COMMANDS

        public static boolean ALLOW_COMMANDS
        Used to determine if all commands are allowed in an arena game

      • BYPASSING_COMMANDS

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> BYPASSING_COMMANDS
        The commands that are allowed even if ALLOW_COMMANDS is set to false

      • LIGHTNING_ENABLED

        public static boolean LIGHTNING_ENABLED
        Used to determine if players are struck by lighting when they die

      • REPUTATION_ENABLED

        public static boolean REPUTATION_ENABLED
        Used to determine if the reputation system should be used or not

      • DEFAULT_REPUTATION

        public static int DEFAULT_REPUTATION
        Used to determine the default reputation (only useful if reputation is enabled)

      • MINIMUM_REP_ADD

        public static int MINIMUM_REP_ADD
        Used to determine the minimum amount of seconds a player must be in an arena before they will earn a reputation point. If they disconnect from the game, they will recieve a negative rep point not matter how long they were in the game

      • BROADCAST_MINUS_REP

        public static boolean BROADCAST_MINUS_REP
        Used to determine if other player's an arena will be notified that a player disconnecting during mid game has negatively impacted their reputation

      • BORDER_ENABLED

        public static boolean BORDER_ENABLED
        Used to determine if the border system will be used in arenas

      • BORDER_TICK_DELAY

        public static int BORDER_TICK_DELAY
        Used to determine how many arena ticks it will take to shrink the border by one block
